content: thanks you may not distribute this pattern or call it your own you may not sell this pattern the items made from this pattern may be used for whatever purpose however if items are sold please link to my blog at https //www facebook com/cozilycovered you will also find additional patterns free and for sale at this address and thanks to you for creating a hat from my pattern i hope you enjoyed creating it contact me at cozilycovered@gmail com with any questions or concerns *note k1 sew too is now cozily covered baby boutique our specialties are baby blankets and baby hats you will still find free and for sale patterns at http //k1sewtoo wordpress com
